data.text: GALA sei ʋɛlɛi laalao guyei. Davide ná-guyei.
Ee, Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI, nà è maamusɛzu,
Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI, nà-GALAGI, gè è loligɛ ga è ɓɔ bà,
Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI, è mɛ̀ɛnni, è kùla saai ya,
À guyei loo Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ʋɛ, wɔiti wo bɛ ga wooɠɛɠila nuiti.
Mazɔlɔɔ ná-ziiɠaawanai la ɗa ga lɛbiga,
Gè ɠɛni ɓɔɠɔ ɠaazu ga nà ziilɛi su, gè ɗa ɠɛ ma:
Ee, Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI, ɗa-nuɓɔɠɔlai ʋɔ, è sɛ̀bɛlɔɔni sèi ɠizei ma.
Ee, Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI, gè wooɠulaa è ma,
«Ni nà zaana, ni nà yeina kabayeɠei zu,
È nà-gɔlɔ wooiti faliboga ga kua wogai koozunɛɛi zu,
naa ɠa a kɛ gè è maamusɛ ga zìimaʋɛ pɛ, gè mina ɓɔlɔ.
